name: append_health
description: Add health data (food name and calories) to the health database for a specific date. This tool allows you to log food items with their calorie values to track daily nutrition intake. Items are automatically organized by date. If no date is provided, it defaults to today's date.

name.description: The name of the food item

calories.description: The number of calories in the food item

date.description: The date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional, defaults to today)

name: get_total_calories
description: Calculate and return the total calories consumed from all items across all days in the health database. This tool reads the entire health database and sums up all calorie values from every date.

name: get_daily_calories
description: Calculate and return the total calories consumed for a specific date. If no date is provided, it defaults to today's date. This tool allows you to track daily calorie intake.

date.description: The date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional, defaults to today)

name: edit_last_item
description: Edit the most recently added health item in the database. You can update the name and/or calories of the last item that was added. Both parameters are optional - provide only the fields you want to update.

name.description: The new name for the food item (optional)

calories.description: The new number of calories for the food item (optional)
